name: City Soarers
description:
I am a 14 year old game developer, and this is my first ever finished project, made in Godot. I am excited to share my game - City Soarers

Guide a jet aeroplane through the city in this simple, cute action game. Choose from 20+ plane colours and see how far you can fly!

But wait. It's not  going to be that easy.  Make sure you avoid the buildings littered through the city in this order:

Blue (Back) - no input/down arrow

Pink (Back_Middle)- down arrow

Red(Middle)- up arrow/down arrow

Yellow (Front_Middle)-up arrow

Green (Front) - no input/back arrow

Music Credit

Title:New Challenger
Artist:HeatleyBros
Writer:Brett Heatley, ASCAP
Publisher:Heatley Music Publishing, ASCAP
Label:Heatley Music Publishing
